section.title: Subject/Object questions
section.sectiontitle: When a wh- question word is the object of the question, we use the normal question word order; question word + auxiliary + subject + verb. Most questions that we ask are object questions.
section.sectiontitle2: When a wh- question word is the subject of the question, the word order is the same as an affirmative sentence; question word + verb + object.
section.text3a:
Who shouted at you?
(NOT Who did shout at you?)
